text: tavada, num̆balāgē biriyan aturin kisivek (āgamen ivatva) num̆balā hæra damā dēva pratikṣēpakayin veta giyē nam pasuva (yuddhayakadī) num̆balā jaya gattehu nam (num̆balāgē) biriyan hæra damā giya ovunaṭa ovun viyadam kaḷa hā samāna deyak labā denu. tavada num̆balā kavara ayaku viśvāsa karannan lesa siṭinnōda evan allāhṭa biya bætimat vanu
